capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? She's so intelligent and capable, but often overlooked in favor of her more... flashy colleagues. Anyway, it's good to confirm that, thanks for bringing it up!
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what kind of belongings does valeria have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-documented fact. I mean, he was the Potions master for many years and held a certain... respect within the school's hierarchy. Although his behavior towards students, especially Harry Potter, was often questionable, it's undeniable that he played an important role in the wizarding world through his association with Hogwarts.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Flitwick is an adult. I'm pretty sure about that, and I think it's a fact that can be confirmed.

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to Harry and he's definitely wearing glasses. I'm quite certain about it, actually. He looked pretty confident in them too, which makes sense since they're really good for his eyesight.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by the history of the wizarding world.
